Video_Title: The Insane Benefits of Water-Only Fasting: Dr. Alan Goldhamer | Rich Roll Podcast
Comment_Text: i fasted no food just water and plain tea with lemon for 46 days and just recently broke it i lost almost 50 pounds and my body completely reset itself regenerated and restored from the inside out i d suddenly started dealing with blood pressure issues and other health problems which the doctor prescribed me medication for that i absolutely refused to take so i prayed about it and god led me on what i thought was a 21 day fast of no food just water but it was actually a 46 day fast instead my body completely changed as if it was repaired to new i m currently on zero medications and my blood pressure previously 180 99 is currently 117 80 with a normal pulse and no other issues in my body completely healthy praise god i also have a lot of energy and i definitely sleep better now and longer once i broke it i had to start off eating very light because my stomach could only handle a very small portion of food of course i thought eating vegetables were ok but not i thought i was going to die after i ate little of them so i started throwing up nonstop which was the worst feeling and my stomach was turning flips amongst other things which i won t mention and i almost passed out fyi after a long period of fasting a little bone broth would probably be better once it s broken since breaking my fast about 2 weeks now i ve only been eating one meal a day drinking just water with lemon and eating no junk foods fast foods nor sweets i eat organic everything lots of vegetables i cook all of my meals now because i know what going in them i buy only organic grass fed meat which i still don t eat a lot of meat that is my whole lifestyle of eating has completely changed without the slightest cravings for any of the mess i was addicted to eating before i don t even miss it fasting is definitely one of the greatest benefits to having a healthier body denying your body the thing it craves most is actually giving your body what it need most and that s no food for an extended period of time be blessed on your journey to becoming a better and healthier you through fasting

Video_Title: The Insane Benefits of Water-Only Fasting: Dr. Alan Goldhamer | Rich Roll Podcast
Comment_Text: i m currently on day 3 40 of my water fasting i was diagnosed with leukemia 2 years ago got cancer free for a year but now my blood tests are showing leukemia cells again i m praying that i will cure or at least help the cancer not to spread more please pray for me edit i ended my water fasting on a day 26 40 i didn t mind at all the fast heartbeat which i think i had it because of dehydration but i started being concerned when i had body chills literally on the day 25 i was feeling so cold the benefits are beyond imagination though i lost 25 pounds i was taking 2 bp medications and now i take none my skin looks so smooth like i am 10 years younger and my vision is so much better now i am eating one meal a day omad because i am scared that leukemia will come back i am determined to do a 3 days water fasting once or twice a month until i am completely cancer free thank you all from the bottom of my heart for the prayers the support and love i wish health happiness and blessings to all of you guys god bless you all hello again today is september 15th 2024 first of i want to thank everyone from the bottom of my heart for all the wishes and advices second of all two days ago i had my last appointment with my hematologist and my test came back negative no cancer cells found i have done a 25 days water fasting a 21 days and a 42 days since january of 2024 i have reverse my type 2 diabetes and high blood pressure and from 228 pounds i m 167 lbs so far fasting is a god send medication that heals every disease and is totally free sending a big hug to every each of you who prayed for me new update today is february the 19th of 2025 i had a follow up appointment with my hematologist and today i received the results after 10 days no cancer cells found no signs of leukemia cells i don t know if it is the water fasting or the endless hours of praying to god to allow to live for my beautiful family but so far it has worked for me i continue to do a 72 hours water fasting every month my weight is currently at 159 lbs and i have so much more energy i m beyond grateful for all of you beautiful and amazing people who prayed for me i thank you with all my heart and i wish health love abundance and everything your heart desires i love you all new edit today is september 25th of 2025 and if you are still wondering i m am doing great still cancer free my last appointment with my hematologist was in last august and all my blood work came back negative no leukemia cells detected my next appointment will be in july of 2026th i m still doing intermittent fasting eating in 4 or 6 hours and water fasting the rest i m planning to do a few 72 hours once in a while thank you to all the amazing people who wished me the best on my health journey i also wish love health and happiness in your lives god bless you all

Comment_Text: i had the exact experience you describe around the 19min mark my husband and i had been together 6 years never able to get pregnant we never used any protection at all and i never got pregnant we didn t know if it was me or him but i suspected it was me because my periods were very irregular at the time sometimes i would go 2 months without a period at all i was approaching 30 and i was desperate to have a baby so i started thinking maybe the hormones in animal products was effecting my hormones so i went plant based became vegan shortly after when i learned the ethical stuff in 5 months after going vegan i found out i was pregnant with my first baby i had a healthy picture perfect vegan pregnancy and had a healthy baby boy 14 months later my husband and i were not being careful and we did the deed once without protection and two weeks later i found out i was pregnant again this time without trying at all it s like i went from being infertile to being extremely fertile now i have 2 healthy boys who i breastfed exclusively and now my period is regular and i have no cramps anymore which i had bad cramps before no breast pain during pms either which i used to have a lot i 100 believe i would not have my sons if i hadn t gone vegan i wish more people would open their eyes to the miracle this diet is i think it could help everyone in some way

Video_Title: The Insane Benefits of Water-Only Fasting: Dr. Alan Goldhamer | Rich Roll Podcast
Comment_Text: i recently completed a 7 day fast drinking only water i just can t believe how i feel now it s amazing i found it very easy to start as i was already on a time restricted eating regime eating only one or 2 meals a day within a 5 hour window i didn t feel hungry at all within the 7 days i felt i could have continued for more than 7 days day 5 and 6 of the fast i felt i needed more sleep my on going back lower back pain from spinal surgery a year ago was causing me real trouble however on day 8 i woke up with no back pain and fabulous skin texture no bags under my eyes not sure what has happened inside but i feel absolutely wonderful i am 69 years old this august and feel more like i am back in my twenties again gail
